item.description:
Duncan Mahood is a masters-level public health consultant with extensive experience in data science and epidemiology, as well as web design, email marketing, and social media. Currently, he works with Epidemiologic Research & Methods, LLC (ERM), an Atlanta-based consulting firm, as well as the Epidemiology Department at Rollins School of Public Health, where he founded and serves as editor-in-chief of The Confounder, a student- and alumni-oriented blog.

Duncan lives and works remotely, but is currently stationed in Atlanta, GA.
